translation.ko: 살인자가 두 번째 이름표를 만들었다는 거죠

translation.en: Only one person didn't have a smudged name tag and that was Jim Trentley.
translation.ko: 번지지 않은 이름표를 가진 사람은 짐밖에 없었어요

translation.en: Call me Jim.
And his was signed with a brand new red Sharpie
that matched the headshot that you signed for me.
Wow.
I'm going to jail, aren't I?
You're not only going to jail, you're also going to hell.
translation.ko: 감옥에 갈 뿐만 아니라 지옥에 가게 될 거예요

translation.en: Do they have golf in jail?
Golf! Of course!
That adds up. We thought Johnny Blaze's last words were "butter."
translation.ko: 이제 말이 되네, 조니의 마지막 말은 '버터'였어요

translation.en: -Butter. -But it wasn't "butter." It was "putter."
-Oh. -Oh, my gosh.
-That's a twist. -This guy's crying.
It's so fucking sad.
He was trying to tell us who the killer was.
But there was an accomplice.
-Who turned off the lights? -Thank you.
The accomplice was Jim Trentley's new girl, Angie!
translation.ko: 공범은 짐 트렌틀리의 새 여친 엔지예요

translation.en: What?
Jim told us his lady friend had magic hands.
translation.ko: 짐은 엔지가 끝내주는 손을 가졌다고 했고

translation.en: Guess who was wrapping the orphan's presents at lightning speed?
She was the one hunting us in the hallway.
She wasn't out of breath from a panic attack,
translation.ko: 공황 발작으로 숨이 찬 게 아니라

translation.en: but from running the hallways in a ski mask, trying to take us out.
translation.ko: 스키 마스크를 쓰고 우릴 잡으러 달려서예요

translation.en: Jim, you idiot! I told you to not talk about my magic hands.
translation.ko: 짐, 바보 같으니! 손은 언급하지 말라고 했잖아

translation.en: -I love you, Boo Boo. -Hey, Jim, why don't you go fuck yourself?
Officers, take him away.
But nobody even gave me a present. If nobody got it...
translation.ko: 난 선물도 못 받았는데 준비를 안 했다면...

translation.en: Can't I-- That's rude.
-Well, thanks for having me. -That was crazy. Thank God it's all over.
Detective!
-Uh-oh. -You wanted a present from the table?
Well, my magic hands wrapped something nice and big for you,
translation.ko: 이 끝내주는 손으로 형사님 선물을 준비했으니

translation.en: and it's going to blow you away!
-Oh, no. -[beeping]
Careful.
A real bomb!
-Look, we need to evacuate. -No time for that.
This entire building is going to blow.
-Fifty-five seconds, MacGruber! -Let me see it.
Oh my God! There are three wires, red, green, and blue.
-Right. -No!
-You're lucky. -[Jason] Good instincts.
translation.ko: 운이 좋으시네 - 잘 찍었어요 - 그럴 준비가 안 됐어요

translation.en: We're not prepared for that.
translation.ko: - 잘 찍었어요 - 그럴 준비가 안 됐어요

translation.en: Cut the correct wire, the bomb will disarm.
translation.ko: 옳은 전선을 끊어야 해체할 수 있어요

translation.en: If you cut the wrong one, we all die.
translation.ko: 옳은 전선을 끊어야 해체할 수 있어요 잘못 자르면, 우린 죽어요

translation.en: You seem comfortable with explosives. You have to run point on this.
translation.ko: 피트, 폭탄을 안 무서워하니 당신이 처리해요

translation.en: Cut the right one, you decide.
Consensus. Talk together about what to do.
[Jason] I think maybe red, the pliers are red.
I think blue because it's the only non Christmas color.
We're running out of time here.
I'm thinking we just go like, three, two, one, go?
Or do we go one, two, three?
-Do we do it on three? -We don't have time for this!
Here we go!
Two! One!
Pete Davidson saved Christmas and saved the day.
You're the hero.
[all] Pete, Pete, Pete,
-Pete, Pete, Pete! -That was some crazy shit.
-Fantastic. -Wow.
Pete, you came in last second, you really saved the day.
-Thanks. -[Maya] Good job.
You trusted your gut. It's a holiday I'm never gonna forget. I know.
translation.ko: 당신 직감을 믿었어요 절대 잊지 못할 명절이에요

translation.en: I want to thank you all for coming down here.
It's been an incredible journey, but...
Thanks so much, Terry.
What's wrong, Mayor?
Well, the day may be saved, but not the spirit of Christmas.
-God dang it, the orphans. -We only have six minutes to sunrise.
Those kids are about to wake up with no presents at all.
translation.ko: 아이들이 곧 일어날 텐데 선물이 없잖아요

translation.en: No, they're not. Somebody get me the Santa suit.
translation.ko: 그렇지 않아요 누가 산타 옷 좀 갖다줘요

translation.en: I'm dreaming of an orange Christmas.
On Donnor, on Blitzen, on Rampage!
Ho, ho, ho. Merry Christmas!
-Santa, you really came! -And your beard grew back!
translation.ko: - 산타 할아버지, 오셨네요! - 수염도 다시 자랐네요!

translation.en: [Terry] Of course I came.
Every good girl and boy deserves a present on Christmas.
Thank you, Terry. I mean, Santa. You saved Christmas.
On the contrary, Christmas saved me.
What?
"To Terry, from Santa?"
It's a Christmas miracle. My noise canceling headphones!
-Where's your present, Terry? -I didn't get one.
translation.ko: - 테리, 네 선물 어딨어? - 못 받았어요

translation.en: I guess Santa felt I didn't deserve one.
translation.ko: 제가 받을 자격이 없다고 생각하셨나 봐요

translation.en: No, I'm sure we just can't--
-Maybe Santa-- -They really work! I can't hear shit!
Terry!
Terry, those aren't for you.
-Those aren't for you! -I really can't hear shit.
translation.ko: - 그쪽 선물이 아니라고요! - 아무것도 안 들려요

translation.en: Terry!
It was for Orphan Terry.
[Terry] The holiday spirit.
You can't wrap it up and put it under the tree,
translation.ko: 포장해서 트리 밑에 둘 순 없다

translation.en: but it's still the most valuable gift I've ever received.
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 받은 선물 중에 가장 값진 선물이다

translation.en: After the headphones, of course.
